reviewText: Video arrived on time and in perfect condition. Subject matter was above and beyond what I expected from a training dvd! It is full of useful information and close ups and slow motion videos of moves that would otherwise be a mystery. Very important details are pointed out. The dvd also has many useful drills. Looking forward to many months of training! You will not find this stuff on YouTube! :)

This is a great DVD for training with detailed explainations. The closeups helped with seeing true form of how your wrist and hand should engage each other. I really liked the individual drills and they also have partner drills if you have someone to work with you. This is SIL LIM TAU-made easy...
